group_1.textRight: Hmm, what should we do...@I don't want it to ring again...
[chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh...that's right!@I just remembered...crepes!
Crepes?

group_1.textLeft: I once had a similar problem when I tried to@make crepes at home.
I looked stuff up at that time.
I'm gonna check the fire detector.

group_1.textRight: Um, how is it...?

group_1.textLeft: Did you find out anything?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, this fire detector is over 15 years old!

group_1.textLeft: It's the old school building, so I don't think@that should come as any surprise?

group_1.textRight: I've heard about this sort of thing.
You need to replace them after 10 or 15 years.
They won't work properly after that long.
How do you know all this?

group_1.textLeft: I learned about it when I set off the alarm in@my house.
I wanted to make crepes, but it was too noisy.

group_1.textRight: ...I see.

group_1.textLeft: The one at home was old and malfunctioned,@so maybe it's the case this time, too.
Should we have it inspected...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'll ask the teacher.
Can I ask you two to work somewhere else?

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, I'll do it in my classroom.
We've just been working here because it saves@us the trouble of moving the materials.
We're planning to make it there on the day@of the festival.
...Um, Tsumugi, could you tell my class?
I don't think any of them can hear me, so...

group_1.textRight: Okay, I got it!
The inspector will be here by the end of today.

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness!
Okay, I'll take care of the rest!
...Hmm? What's on my head right now...?
.........[wait:0.8][chara:302401:motion_0][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Seeds? Did they just fall on me?

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi? Are you ready to go?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, wait!
Hmm...something's strange...

group_1.textRight: Strange...?

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it strange that someone would@set this up?

group_1.textRight: Causing trouble is already strange,@if you ask me.

group_1.textLeft: No, you're wrong...!@I mean, you're right, but...
What I'm trying to say is...
It's not like it's been set up, it's more like@it's happening by accident.

group_1.textRight: ...By accident?
You mean like it's not under anyone's control?

group_1.textLeft: Right! I don't understand what the culprit@wants to do.

group_1.textRight: Well, I'm pretty sure they want to cancel the@school festival.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right.

group_1.textRight: ...I was just making a little joke...
What you're trying to say is,
"I don't understand what their motive is for@trying to cancel the school festival."
...That's what you mean, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's my Manaka! You know what I'm@talking about!
I wonder if we can figure out who the culprit@is if we can figure out their motive?

group_1.textRight: Can you think of anything?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...not really?
